column4: hi, i had a user that accidently chmodded his home dir, and now it wont boot up properly, says it cant find the user's home dir.. any ideas how to fix this?
cant you just chmod it back to the way it was?
ah, i dont really know actually. all files probably didnt have the same chmod....hm
but to be able to boot he should set some rights that just lets him read and execute everything I guess
